string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?!

The Sand Bandits are a secret organization that works for the good of the people in #m260000000#. What can you do to help? Since #b#p2101012##k of #b#m260010400##k is a member of the Sand Bandits, you should go talk to him.

#p2101012# tells you it's time to steal the queen's treasure. First, you need to go to the #bpalace#k. Since you need to be discreet, you'll have to #buse the hidden portals in the castle#k to get to the queen's treasure chest and steal the treasure. Wait, then why did he want the Poisoned Needles and the rope? You're not even using them...\n\n#i4031578# #t4031578# #b#c4031578##k/1
Phew, you gave #p2101012# the ring from the queen's treasure chest. Isn't a task this important supposed to reserved for experienced members of the team?
오, 모래그림단의 든든한 후원자께서 오셨군. 마침 기다리고 있었소. 이번에야말로 왕비의 보물을 훔칠 생각인데... 물론 당신께서도 도와주시겠지?
하하하! 역시! 그럴 줄 알았소. 해야 할 일은 왕비의 보물창고에 들어가서 왕비의 보물을 훔쳐오는 것이라오. 물론 쉽지 않은 일이지만 모래그림단을 위한 일이잖소? 당신이라면 해낼 거라고 믿소. 후후후....
보석을 새로 들여놓은지 얼마 되지 않아서 왕비는 낯선 사람만 보면 무조건 수상한 자라고 소리칠 거요. 그러니, 궁성 안에 들어가면, 왕비의 앞을 지나지 않고 다른 길들을 이용해서 최대한 조심스럽게 보물창고로 들어가시오. 그럼 기대하겠소.
흥! 이제 와서 발을 빼겠다는 거요?
Hello there, loyal, faithful, unyielding supporter of the Sand Bandits. I've been waiting for you. This time, we're going to steal the queen's treasure, and you'll help of course, right?

I knew it. Your task is to steal the #bqueen's treasure#k from the #bqueen's accessory chest#k. It's placed in the deepest part of the palace, near the king. It'll be hard for you to get close to it, but this is for Sand Bandits. I am sure you're up to the task.

Security inside the castle is very tight these days. There will guards everywhere, ready to pounce. So once you enter, be careful where you walk. Use hidden portals to discreetly approach the chest and retrieve the jewel. I'll wait here.
Welcome back! Did you get the #t4031578#? Ohhhh, just as I expected! Nice, this should fetch some money…
Thanks to you, the Red Scor...er, I mean, Sand Bandits have been doing very, very well lately. Thank you. Hahaha... I hope you keep helping us down the road.

Hmmm... I don't think you've obtained the #b#t4031578##k yet. It should be inside the #bqueen's accessory chest#k inside the #bpalace#k. Of course, you must be discreet and use hidden portals. Good luck.
